attributes.comment:
I oppose the proposed increase in filing fees, especially those associated with international
adoption. I ask you to reject the fee increase.

Adoptive families are already having to re-file the documents that are required because of the
increased wait time associated with international adoption. We are currently paying double the
intended fee because of this. The length of time that these documents are valid should be
increased, in order to correlate with the longer wait times that adoptive families are experiencing.

The cost of bringing an orphan into a family is already exorbinant. Please do not make it even
more difficult for families.


Comment on FR Doc # E7-01631
attributes.title: Comment Submitted by Angela Wiggins
